TopicTitle: Can we have a Kracken drive? :)

Articles.Content:
Kerbal rescue in low orbit about Minmus.  I was thrown off the rocket, ragdolled and tumbling.  I switched away and back, that fixed the ragdoll but I was still tumbling.  I applied one click of timewarp for a moment to kill that and 4 lines came out of nowhere and accelerated me like crazy.  I think my trajectory intersected Minmus but if it didn't I had the velocity to be thrown clear out of Kerbin's SOI.  (I didn't stick around to figure out what was going to happen.)

That's the best acceleration I've seen in this game yet.  How do I put it in an engine and control it?

The one click of timewarp fixes ragdolling, too. You don't need to switch away.

But yeah, just after a "warp to here" timewarp, one of my ships was accelerated to 1% of lightspeed recently.
